title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
instructions: Boil pasta. Heat sauce. Mix together. Sprinkle cheese.

title: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Melt butter in pan. Cook eggs.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Cook on griddle.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden.
